SELECT SB.ID_BOARD , SBT.ID_BOARD_TYPE , SB.DS_TITLE
, SB.CD_CATEGORY , SB.TP_PARTITION , SB.FG_AUTH_ACTIVE , SB.DT_REG , SB.ID_REG_EMP , SB.DT_UPT , SB.ID_UPT_EMP FROM SYS_BOARD SB WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN SYS_BOARD_TYPE SBT WITH (NOLOCK) ON SB.ID_BOARD = SBT.ID_BOARD WHERE SB.ID_BOARD = #{ID_BOARD} AND SB.FG_USE = 'A' AND SB.FG_DEL = 'N'

SELECT ID_BOARD_TYPE , FG_DATA_ITEM , FG_DATA_ITEM_NEW , FG_DATA_ITEM_FILE , FG_DATA_ITEM_REPLY , FG_NOTICE , CNT_NOTICE , FG_FILE , DS_FILE_EXTENSION , DS_FILE_VOLUME , CNT_MAX_FILE , FG_REPLY , FG_ANSWER , FG_PRE_NEXT , FG_GOOD_BAD , FG_EXCEL_DOWN , FG_TEXT_EDITOR , FG_INQUIRY_HISTORY FROM SYS_BOARD_TYPE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID_BOARD = #{ID_BOARD}
